title: Download
subtitle: Heroic is available for all Major operating systems.

flatpak.title: Flatpak
flatpak.description: Get the best Heroic experience on any Linux distribution or on the Steam Deck via Flatpak.

appimage.title: AppImage
appimage.description: Download it in AppImage format so it will work on any Linux distro. The AppImage can update itself when a new version is released.

other.title: Other
other.description: Heroic is also distributed in RPM, DEB and a TAR.XZ file. Check for alternative repos in our Github.

setup.title: Setup
setup.description: Install Heroic on your system and get auto-updates when a new version is released. Next, Next, Finish!

portable.title: Portable
portable.description: Use the portable version in case you do not want the full installation. Check for x64 and arm64 versions on our Github.

appleChips.title: Apple Chips (M1 and Newer)
appleChips.description: Optimized for Apple Silicon Chips. Open it and copy the Heroic App to the Applications folder and you are good to go!

intelChips.title: Intel Chips
intelChips.description: Optimized for Intel Chips. Open it and copy the Heroic App to the Applications folder and you are good to go!
